favourite.article: It is very encouraging to know that as lovers of Christ we are with Him in ascension enjoying all the riches of His life! Hallelujah we have become His private Garden with fountain, fruits and spice for God's enjoyment! The more we enjoy Christ the more He makes us beautiful, as beautiful as Tirzah and eventually we become the sanctuary of God! As we become the sanctuary of God, He forms us into an Army, a terrible Army with banners to defeat God's enemy and to usher in God's Kingdom! Hallelujah! And to consumate the New Jerusalem! I love You, Lord Jesus! ...I'm really enjoying this hymn, Jesus is Lord! Amen!
Thank You Lord, that You are preparing us right now as Your overcoming Bride! Make us those who express You! Oh we love You!!
Lord Jesus we give You the Glory!
Amen, yes may we be encouraged to seek Him everyday and to seize every opportunity to love Him. Lord Jesus! Draw us much more to You daily.

I needed some encouragement tonight and found myself trying to find my wedding hymn. I got married 12 years ago and the young people sang this hymn as I walked toward my husband. I thought I would be encouraged by the sweetness of this hymn, and I was..... BUT what encouraged me most was reading all the comments from all my brothers and sisters who are enjoying this hymn around the world... Nigeria, Philipines, Fiji, etc. I am so strengthened by you all. You remind me that our enjoyment of Christ is not just for ourselves, but is also for the strengthening and building of the Body of Christ. Our enjoyment is a sweet testimony of our love for Him. May we all be encouraged to seek Him everyday, to seize every opportunity to love Him.

Amen, this song is so sweet! It refreshes my mind when every time I enjoy it. Saints, do you want to be the lovers of Christ? I really do. I experienced that the simple way to be the lover of Christ is to ENJOY HIM. The more I enjoy Him, the more I will be constituted with His life. If everyone would enjoy the Lord and be filled with His life to the uttermost, Christ will gain His counterpart, who is His beloved Bride. What miracle! What mystery! That God and man should blended be.The Triune God, tripartite man. A loving pair eternally. As man yet God they coinhere. A mutual dwelling place to be.
Oh how I love Christ! I love Christ because He loves me! AMEN!
Oh...This is our theme during Summer Truth Training this year. PRAISE THE LORD! I AM A LOVER OF CHRIST! :)

Unless we personally love the Lord there is no guarantee that we will remain in the church. May the Lord have mercy on us that with His own love we will love Him back with our whole being, with our whole mind and with our whole strength.
I really love this song. It inspired me a lot every time I heard it. Praise the Lord, saints that we are the chosen people of God. Amen!

The church is a group of the believers of Christ who love Him. They are the crazy lovers of Christ like in Eph. 5:25 says that the Lord gave Himself up for the church. And we members of the Body which is the church will be glorified when the day comes the church will be the most beautiful in the eyes of God. Hallelujah for this great mystery: Christ and the church as the one couple as one new man. O LORD WE LOVE YOU!!!!!!

Oh!! I love the church. She's beautiful as Tirzah, as lovely as Jerusalem, shining like the sun, beautiful as the moon. She's Christ duplication, the NEW JERUSALEM!! Amen. Praise the Lord for we belong to this glorious church.

"We are lovers of Christ in His ascension and now we can can enjoy all the riches of His life that was imparted into us". We need to love Him because in 1 Corinthians 16:22 Paul says that "if anyone does not love the Lord, let him be accursed! the Lord comes! AMEN.
Praise the Lord. We are in the process of consummating as the New Jerusalem. I enjoy this hymn so much in my spirit. Christ is Victor!
I love this song because it's very sweet. It's makes me feel wonderful inside and I'm glad to even know this song. Praise the Lord saints!!!
